replies.body:
{{champion:126}} Alright everyone, according to our scouts, Viktor and his Battlecast creatures will be here soon. Let’s make sure everyone here. Fullmetal Jayce ready. 

{{champion:72}} Battlecasted Skarner V2, Online and ready. 

{{champion:51}} Headhunter Caitlyn, ready to collect. 

{{champion:74}} Hazmat Heimerdinger, ready with new weapons.
 
{{champion:115}} Major Ziggs, all set to blow s*** up. 

{{champion:86}} Steel Legion Garen, ready to DEMACIA!!!!

{{champion:99}} Steel Legion Lux, what he said. 

{{champion:5}} Commando Xin Zhao, ready to fight for my king. 

{{champion:81}} Pulsefire Ezreal ready with power levels over 9000.
 
{{champion:44}} 5th age Taric, here and FABULOUS 

{{champion:222}} Jinx here with lots and lots of belts. He won’t be taking them from me. 

{{champion:254}} D-Debonair Vi here. 

{{champion:222}} And..?

{{champion:254}} And ready to fight like a gentleman. 

{{champion:222}} HAhahahahahahahahahahaha. 

{{champion:37}} ……

{{champion:126}} Head up!! I see them.
{{champion:82}} HUE HUE HUE HUE.
I personal hope viktor wins. ALL HAIL THE GLORIOUS EVOLUTION !!!!!
5th age taric is everything. And nobody will stop it.
Your name just makes that comment better.
{{champion:17}} captain teemo on booty
{{champion:17}}  Armed and ready!!!
Teemo has arms?!

and... We're just assuming Sona is here. Right?

W/e too late now

You expected her to say something? 

But she is there.
If it was battlecast skarner why would he be with them? didn't viktor create all the battlecast?
Battlecast skarner is in their because rito(viktor) still hasn't released him, so it is joining the rebellion...?
SSSSHHHHH just go with it
ARCADE{{champion:120}} ON SALE  {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} !!!
WHO CARES,{{champion:26}} IS ON SALE {{item:3026}} {{item:3026}}
WHO CARES, SUPERB VILLAIN{{champion:45}}IS ON SALE {{item:3128}} {{item:3128}} {{item:3128}}
Wait who is gonna buy Superb Villain Veigar when Final Boss is coming out soon?
Cuz final boss is a legendary skin and i for one dont have that kind of money :(
suprise aatrox is here {{champion:266}}  {{item:3026}} {{champion:26}} {{summoner:10}} cant kill me
Zombie {{champion:266}}  FTW
{{champion:26}} I knew you would do that.

{{champion:103}} Hey, Vi.

{{champion:254}} Yeah?

{{champion:103}} Say you were wearing your Debonair outfit...

{{champion:254}} Oh, no...

{{champion:103}} And I charmed you...

{{champion:254}} Oh, God no...

{{champion:103}} -Smirks- Would that make you and me straight?

{{champion:254}} JUST LEAVE ME ALONE, I NEVER ASKED FOR THAT STUPID OUTFIT! -Qs and run away to base as she cries, never thinking of using Recall to make things more dramatic. Then disconnects.-

{{champion:103}} All: Report Vi for rage quit. :3
You should start your own series of stories
MUFFIN MUFFIN MUFFIN MUFFIN
u called?
i will eat all of you guys
*Ahem*
riot give us more refunds PLS
That bearded guy has been on sale a  {{champion:26}}  times. -cri-
{{champion:26}} I knew i just did that
make a new skin for {{champion:154}}
Riot is giving yasuo a second skin when zac still only has one. logic

logic in making money you mean zac is currently one of the least played champions in the entire game riot has to spend a larger amount of effort then they should with there 3D analog to make a skin for him then the amount of money they would MAKE from people buying him and the skin if a skin were to be released. Besides do you see many community ideas for a skin for him?

Wow. There was one period in that entire sentence.


Edit: I meant paragraph. That should be two or three sentences.
Well yeah, there is only ever one period in any sentence, otherwise it is more than one sentence

What about {{champion:222}} ? Its possible by the looks of it that riot can make another skin for her. I get that the animations are a tougher problem, but considering {{champion:157}}  was released after Jinx, I would be expecting another. Not to mention Jinx is highly played among worldwide.
Idk, any skin ideas I see for Zac are always a bit of a stretch.
The {{champion:45}} skin is a trap. Don't buy it. Be patient.
{{champion:161}}  nice try riot, we see what youre doing!
I don't {{champion:64}}
I don't {{champion:127}}

STOP WITH THIS CHAIN

It was funny the first hundred times, but it's gotten really old.
i HATE you riot. I just bought arcade {{champion:120}} 2days ago. now its on sale..
You can send in a support ticket and they will refund the difference since it was less then 2 weeks between you buying it and it going on sale.
Thanks I did and i got the RP difference back. :D {{champion:120}}
The only champion I still need is Vel'koz, and he still has yet to have his fist sale. (172 days since his release) 108 days since aatrox last sale.. Make's sense to me.
I'm almost certain its possible to save 6,300 Ip in 172 days...
I would say this is gonna be intense. But will all of the arcade {{champion:120}}s that will be running around, I think it's just gonna be inTENTS, considering all of the camping there's gonna be.
Hmm. Should I get Aatrox or wait for a dang Vel'koz sale (it's been 200 days come on)
you should get AATROX!!!!{{champion:266}} !!!!!!
